p.strong: Alamance-Burlington Board of Education Seeks Applicants for
Alamance Community College Board of Trustees Appointment

span.p: The Alamance-Burlington Board of Education is seeking applicants for an appointment to the Board of Trustees for Alamance Community College. Alamance County residents with an interest in serving in this capacity should submit a letter stating their qualifications to the Alamance-Burlington Board of Education no later than Friday, May 29, 2020 at 5:00 p.m.

a.title: Go to comments for Alamance-Burlington Board of Education Seeks Applicants for Alamance Community College Board of Trustees Appointment

span.p:
Transfer Applications
April 14-May 10, 2020 | At this time, transfer applications are live. Visit our website to complete the process online.

a.title: Go to comments for Transfer Applications

span.p: Attention current 11th grade students, before returning to school for 2020-2021 year, all rising 12 grade students are now required to have a second dose of the Meningococcal vaccine. Please provide proof of vaccination records directly to the school before returning to school. For more information or if you have questions, please contact your school nurse.

a.title: Go to comments for New Immunization Requirement

p.strong: New High School Project Community Presentation
p.br: View the presentation. Please share your input at newhighschool@abss.k12.nc.us

a.title: Go to comments for New High School Project Community Presentation

p.br: Beginning February 1, 2019, ABSS has new guidelines for school visitors. View guidelines - English | Spanish.

a.title: Go to comments for New School Visitor Guidelines

p.br: Each school's latest School Improvement Plan is posted on the school website. ABSS invites your feedback on the School Improvement Plans. View School Improvement Plans and comment on your school's plan. Thank you!

a.title: Go to comments for School Improvement Plans

img.alt: SAFE Tips Hotline - There are all kinds of reasons to use your school's tip line...Bullying, threats, cyberbullying, sexting, weapons, cutting, suicidal thoughts, drugs & alcohol, depression, domestic violence - do something about it. Text or Call the phone numbers here.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.br: Providing engaging work for our students will enable the Alamance–Burlington School System to educate all students to meet high academic standards and become responsible citizens in a rapidly changing world.

We are in the process of reviewing and updating the ABSS website for accessibility. If you have any concerns, issues, or questions regarding access to any information on our website please contact our webmaster.

ul.li: Blackboard Web Community Manager Privacy Policy (Updated) |
